A team introduction section displaying team members and their roles
A project showcase section listing team projects with descriptions and visuals
A skill showcase section highlighting the team's technical and soft skills
A contact information section providing ways to reach the team
Frontend pages to display team data fetched dynamically from backend APIs
Backend API endpoints to serve team, project, and skill data from a PostgreSQL database
Database schema supporting storage of team members, projects, skills, and contact details
Environment configuration for PostgreSQL connection using specified DB credentials
Frontend styled with a default background color of whitesmoke and component color of dark cyan
Navigation menu allowing users to access each main section of the site
Responsive design ensuring usability across desktop and mobile devices
Project case view allowing detailed exploration of individual projects
Contact form enabling visitors to send messages directly to the team
Package.json scripts for `install:all` to set up both frontend and backend dependencies
Package.json script for `dev` to run frontend and backend servers concurrently
